title: What are the questions and requirements for the counselor in Common App? My counselor is asking me since she is working from home thus, some of the files are in her office. - Quora

response.answer_text: Send this link to your counselor: the Common App Help page directs the users to the specific info and provides support when needed. Click on the Recommender Guide or go to the recommenders solutions center to find answers to the most common questions. Also, these links: Common App for recommenders and Coming Soon: Common App Recommender System Designed to Better Serve You
